content: --कांतः, --माणिः the moonstone (supposed to ooze away under the influence of the moon); द्रवति च हिनरश्मावुद्गते चद्रकांतः <ls>U. 6. 12</ls>; <ls>Śi. 4. 58</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 57</ls>; <ls>Bh. 1. 21</ls>; <ls>Māl. 1. 24.</ls> (--तः --तं the white eatable water-lily blossoming during the night. (--तं sandal-wood.
